features.name: Authentication
features.description: User authentication with Supabase Auth including sign in, sign up, and sign out flows with email/password

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard showing session library with stats cards, filtering, and session list management

features.name: Session Management
features.description: Create, read, update, and delete interview/trading sessions with metadata, status tracking, and organization by company or symbol

features.name: Audio Recording
features.description: Browser-based audio recording with WebRTC, automatic upload to Supabase Storage, and playback controls

features.name: Video Recording
features.description: Browser-based video recording with WebRTC, automatic upload to Supabase Storage, and video playback

features.name: Bookmarks
features.description: Add, edit, and delete timestamped bookmarks during session replay with category labels and quick navigation

features.name: Session Notes
features.description: Add and edit personal notes for sessions with auto-save functionality

features.name: Transcripts
features.description: Manual transcript editor with search/highlighting and text pasting capabilities

features.name: AI Actions
features.description: Queue and manage AI jobs for transcription, summarization, scoring, and bookmark suggestions via Supabase Edge Functions

features.name: Session Sharing
features.description: Generate secure, token-based share links for read-only session access with revocation capability

features.name: Company Management
features.description: Create and manage target companies for organizing interview sessions

features.name: Symbol Management
features.description: Create and manage trading symbols/tickers for organizing trading sessions

features.name: Theme Toggle
features.description: Dark/light mode theme switching with system preference detection

features.name: Layout Components
features.description: Reusable layout components including app shell, page headers, section cards, and empty states

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Global and route-level error boundaries for graceful error handling

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Public-facing landing page showcasing features with hero section and call-to-action
